FundamentalAttribution 0.1.1
  • Reference

Reference

Load data

Functions to load data into the correct format/shape for the attribution functions

fa_load_assets_xts()

Combine asset weights, returns and fundamental-to-price ratios into a data.table

fa_load_fund_xts()

Combine fund returns and fundamental-to-price ratio into data.table

Return attribution

Functions for calculating attribution effects

fa_attribution()

Apply the fundamental attribution calculations to a portfolio

fa_attribution_relative()

Calculate fundamental attribution of relative returns

fa_add_fund_level()

Add fund level data to attribution results

Charts and tables

Analyse and present attribution results

fa_chart_cumulative_attribution()

A chart of the cumulative returns from each attribution component

fa_table_log_returns_pa()

A summary table of attribution return components

Output helper functions

fa_chart_data_prep()

Prepare attribution results data for plotting or other analysis

theme_fa()

Apply a theme to a ggplot object

Exmaple data

Invented examples to demonstrate calculations and functions

returns_short

Returns of four assets covering two periods

fundamental_yield_short

Yields of four assets covering three dates

returns_long

Returns of three assets covering 12 periods

fundamental_yield_long

Yields of three assets covering 13 dates
